summary: This module defines a map layer capable of rendering multiple circular markers and the marker objects themselves. The layer manages creation, retrieval, and integration of circles with geographic coordinates, visual styling, and optional size scaling, enabling their use within the Flet map control.
business_intent: Provide developers using the Flet Python SDK a convenient API to add and manage styled circular markers on interactive maps, supporting customization of position, color, border, stroke width, and radius, with optional meter-based scaling.
